title: Marketplace Money for Friday, June 28, 2013
description: What was your last fight over money about? This weekend, the gloves come off: we're tackling your financial feuds! In round 1: A fight over wasting too much energy. In round 2: fighting about food costs. And in round 3: arguing over whether your spouse should go back to work. We have some helpful advice for all these fights. But what do you do when you can't resolve your financial disputes? You might have to head to court. Listen to find out ways you can succeed in small claims cases.  Speaking of court, we look at what the Supreme Court's decision to strike down the Defense of Marriage Act means for your personal finances.
byline: Steve Monroe, Steve Gardner, Dayana Yochim, Liz Weston, Louis Barajas, Sally Herships and Margaret Aery
